name: Thornmail
description:
“You have been sent to Maldon Valley, where an old fort lies abandoned guarded by spirits, to recover the Thornmail: an ancient armour which might help your country survive the incoming invasion of forces coming from the west. You are all adventurers, historians, alchemists and soldiers at the service of your senate, chosen to receive the Argon: an ancient ring thought to be able to destroy any magical shield in existence. Your mission: infiltrate the fortress, recover the Thornmail and return with it.”

A RPG adventure for 2 - 5 players.

Use any system you like!

Inspired by Dark Souls, Blasphemous, Pentakill and Sacred.
